summary: An abstract base class that defines the common structure and behavior for all backend objects supplied by a provider. It encapsulates immutable configuration data, mutable runtime options, and optional dynamic properties such as version or noise characteristics. Subclasses are expected to implement the execution logic and default option handling.
business_intent: Provide a uniform interface for providers to expose backends, allowing users to configure, query, and execute quantum experiments while abstracting provider-specific details.
